text: Bad Boys is an American action comedy. The movie is about the trafficking of drugs in the Miami area. Will Smith and Martin Lawrence star in the movie. The earlier stars as Mike Lowrey; the latter as Marcus. Bad Boys was released in April 1995. There was a 2003 sequel, Bad Boys II. ==Other websites== * Category:1995 movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:African-American movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Bad Boys (1995 movie)
